data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 16 Bit Battle Backgrounds
data.detailed_description:
This is something different, instead of more monsters, this pack of assets brings a series of 50+ backgrounds that match the pixel-ratio of Tyler's Pixel-style monsters (3X) and the Time Fantasy Sprites by Jason Perry in RPG Maker MV, MZ, and VX ACE. Combined with Tyler’s 7th 50 and 8th 50 packs (Time Fantasy Tribute) and Jason Perry’s “Time Fantasy Monsters” for a whole-game aesthetic that your project, and users will love!

Features:

* 51 original battle backgrounds in 16-bit pixel style using color palettes: GameBoy (4 color), NYX8 (8 color), AAP 64 (64 color), NES (55 color), DB-ISO (22 color), Matriax (128 color), TimeFantasy (120 color), TimeFantasy (192 color)
* 51 non-pixel-style versions of the same backgrounds usable in RPG Maker programs if you're not going "pixel-Style" on your next project
* Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker programs (MZ, MV, and VXACE)
* Match these backgrounds to Tyler's pixel style monsters and Jason Perry's Time Fantasy Sprites for a consistent project aesthetic

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* Not OK for use in adult-rated games

data.short_description: Tyler Warren introduces something different…backgrounds! These battlebacks pixel-ratio are designed especially to work with both Tyler’s pixel-style monsters and Jason Perry's Time Fantasy Sprites
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
